articles.author: Jackson Payne
articles.title: 3 takeaways from BYU’s loss to Texas Tech - Deseret News
articles.description: With the loss, BYU is now 8-1 on the season and 5-1 in Big 12 play.
articles.content:
Undefeated no more.
No. 7 BYU suffered its first loss of the season Saturday against Texas Tech, falling 29-7 to the No. 8-ranked Red Raiders.
The Cougars are now 8-1 on the year and 5-1 in Big 12 … [+3405 chars]
